price: 27. Jie nekalba tol, kol Jis nekalbėjo, ir jie elgiasi pagal Jo Įsakymą.
arabic: لَا يَسۡبِقُونَهُۥ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُم بِأَمۡرِهِۦ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā yasbiqūnahu bil-qawli wahum bi-amrihi yaʿmalūna
